Title: Lude Awakening
Plot: Nancy gets a reality check about what a life of crime can entail. Andy acts like a fool and gets arrested. Celia tries alternative methods to deal with her breast cancer. She also steps out of her box and bonds with children. Shane gets in trouble at school. Again.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Becky Thyre, Shawn Schepps, Joey Gray, David Pressman, Soledad St. Hilaire, Allison Janney, Ayla Kell, Shoshannah Stern, Lochlyn Munro
